metadata.title: CVE-2021-47420 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdkfd: fix a potential ttm->sg memory leakMemory is allocated for ttm->sg by kmalloc in kfd_mem_dmamap_userptr,but isn't freed by kfree in kfd_mem_dmaunmap_userptr. Free it!

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
